name: Alabaster Exarch
text: Deploy: Cleanse all Units in this Lane.
flavor: Purge the Dark. Leave behind purest light.

name: Avenging Force
text: Conquer: Each Player buries one of their Units in the conquered Lane.
flavor: There is no mercy for the damned.

name: Baby Lamassu
text: Deploy: Gain Taunt. Crystallize: This and a friendly Crystal gain Crystalborn.
flavor: Though young in form, its spirit carries the weight of mystical skies and the innocence of cherished memories

name: Blackmarble Gargoyle
text: Deploy: Gain Taunt.
flavor: Birthed from obsidian skies, this divine Beast hungers not for reverence, but for blood.

name: Chronosand Sphinx
text: Crystallize: Gain Crystalborn. Deploy: Every Player may return one of their Crystals to their Hand.
flavor: Its gaze stretches into tomorrow, trapping foes in a slow dance of dwindling chances.

name: Cryptosphinx
text: Crystallize: Gain Crystalborn.
flavor: To seek its counsel is to risk eternity in stone, trapped in a puzzle with no end.

name: Damaged Automaton
text: Deploy: Gain Ward.
flavor: Though battered and bruised, even in decay it serves a purpose.

name: Diviner of Fates
text: Deploy: Gain Ward. You may move an adjacent enemy Unit.
flavor: Even the fate of gods is nothing but a game when you can see the future.

name: Doma Angel
flavor: In her shadow, destiny is sealed.

name: Dove of Serenity
text: Whenever a friendly Divine Unit is deployed adjacently, gain +2 Power.
flavor: Wherever it flutters, peace is sure to follow.

name: Dream Traveler
text: Deploy: This gains Ward. Crystallize: You may return a friendly Unit to your Hand.
flavor: Bounce

name: Embalmed Apophis
text: Ambush: Your Opponent conquered this Lane this Turn.
flavor: Roused from ageless dreams, its bindings frayed but its purpose unyielding.

name: Feline Ushabti
text: Crystallize: You may bury this to glimpse 2.
flavor: In the moonlight, both statue and predator come to life.

name: Guardian of the Gates
text: Ally of Construct: All friendly Construct Units gain +1 Power.
flavor: Dumb-Dumb, give Gum-Gum!

name: Hallowed Exorcist
text: Deploy: Cleanse an adjacent Unit.
flavor: His chants echo, a cleansing force against the encroaching darkness.

name: Harmonic Echo
text: Ally of Angel: An adjacent friendly Unit gains Ward and +2 Power.
flavor: In its wake, a symphony lingers, resonating with the pulse of the divine.

name: Ibis Ushabti
text: Crystallize: You may bury this to draw a Card.
flavor: Crafted in reverence, it bridges the realms of past pharaohs and present souls.

name: Maze Master Sphinx
text: Deploy: Crystallize the top Construct of your Deck. Shuffle your deck.
flavor: Guardian of ancient secrets, it diverts its endless watch with games woven from wisdom and whimsy.

name: Mystic Puzzle Box
text: Crystallize: Unleash <D><D><D>: Draw a Card for each other friendly Construct Crystal.
flavor: An enigmatic artifact that ensnares curiosity, rewarding those who unravel its secrets with forbidden knowledge.

name: Oasis Sprite
text: Crystallize: Gain Crystalborn. Deploy: Draw a Card.
flavor: From her touch, the desert blooms and weary travelers find respite.

name: Pharaoh's Bodyguard
text: Ally of Divine: Gain Taunt.
flavor: He laid down his life once; now he stands guard forever.

name: Scripture Monkey
text: Deploy: Choose one: - Gain +1 Power for each Card in your Hand. - Glimpse 2, then draw a Card.
flavor: Ancient texts become playthings, yet through its eyes, the profound and playful are one.

name: Sekhem Chariot
text: Deploy: If an adjacent enemy Unit has 2 or less Power, draw a Card.
flavor: In the presence of the weak, its wheels spin faster, echoing the merciless pace of the desert sun.

name: Obsidian Scarab
flavor: Born from the darkest sands, its shell holds the secrets of eternity.

name: Thunderswarm Skirmisher
text: Deploy: Gain Ward. Gain +3 Power if there is an adjacent Demon or Warrior.
flavor: Clad in celestial armor, his battle cry echoes like thunder, a fearsome herald of the skies' wrath.

name: Tranquil Herd Gem Titan
text: Deploy: All friendly Divine Units in this Lane gain Ward.
flavor: Beside him lay a gemstone charm, its arrival as mysterious as the energy it exuded. Puzzled, he held it, feeling an inexplicable sense of safety.

name: Thunderswarm Pegasus
flavor: When the Thunderswarm march, even the skies make way.

name: Ghostfire Basilisk
flavor: Guardian of the necropolis, its ghostly flames protect the gates against the unworthy.

name: Cartouche Luster
text: Deploy: Swap an adjacent Unit with a friendly Angel or Animal.
flavor: Its plumes hold the hues of a long-lost dynasty, vibrant against the desert sun.

name: Wrath of the Pharaoh
flavor: From ancient tombs, a fury rises; even kings have their reckoning.

name: Bringer of Good News
text: Whenever a Unit moves or swaps, gain +2 Power. Ally of Insect: You may move an adjacent friendly Unit.

name: Pomegrake
flavor: Amongst the twisting vines, it slinks rustling leaves, for not all fruits are meant for picking.

name: The Embalmer
text: Ally of Angel: Unearth a Unit and give it Ward. Ally of Demon: Bury an adjacent Unit.

name: Ushabti Carver
text: Deploy: Cards in your hand gain "Crystallize: You may bury this to draw 2 Cards." until end of turn.

name: Blessing Bestower
text: Deploy: Glimpse 2.

name: Crimson Flamechick
text: Bury: bury an adjacent enemy Unit.
flavor: A spark today, an inferno tomorrow; its flame never extinguished, merely reborn.

name: Thunderswarm Celestial
flavor: Whenever he flaps his wings, muted thunder rumbles, and soft arcs of electricity dance around his form.

name: The Second Wing
text: Deploy: Each Player shuffles their Hand into the Deck and draws that many Cards.
flavor: When all seems lost, it descends, a majestic force reviving spirits and rewriting destinies.

name: Moon Priestess
text: Deploy: Choose one: - Cleanse a Unit in this Lane. - Unearth a Unit in this Lane and give it +2 Power.
flavor: Bathed in moonlight, her healing touch mends more than flesh; it soothes the soul.

name: Moonspear Paladin
flavor: A stalwart knight with divine blessings, who draws strength and guidance from the moon.

name: Glowing Gearhulk
text: Deploy: Gain Taunt. Crystallize: If your Opponent conquered a Lane last Turn, you may deploy this.
flavor: ??? Deploy from not-hand ???

name: Goat Oracle
text: Deploy: Glimpse equal to the number of Realms of friendly Crystals.
flavor: Oracle of many realms, seer of countless fates, yet inexplicably unsettled by the mere thought of turtles.

name: Tranquil Herd Sagehorn
flavor: From ancient lands and Crystalline veins, this wise behemoth channels the arcane.

name: Sunblessed Crocodile
text: Crystallize: Gain Crystalborn. Deploy: Gains +1 Power for each friendly Crystal.
flavor: Though tempered by the ages, his radiant might remains unbridled; a true testament of enduring power.

name: Kois of Duality
text: Deploy: Choose one: - Adjacent friendly Void Units gain +2 Power. - Adjacent friendly Divine Units gain +2 Power.
flavor: Swimming through the celestial rift, it harmonizes the contrasting forces of divinity and abyss.

name: Ivoryscar Eclipsion
flavor: Where light meets shadow, purity clashes with malice, she stands, the ethereal balance of two worlds.

name: Fallen Angel
text: Deploy: Gain Ward. Ally of Void: +4 Power. Ally of Divine: +4 Power.
flavor: Cast from heaven, embraced by the void, her power surges where light and darkness intertwine.

name: Cavern Lindwurm
text: Ally of 5 or more Power: Gain Taunt and +3 Power.
flavor: Where one dragon's roar shakes the cavern, two can bring mountains to their knees.

name: Cheerful Pixies
text: Deploy: Another friendly Elemental Unit in this Lane gains Taunt and +1 Power.
flavor: With giggles and pranks, they lure foes closer, their laughter as entrancing as it is maddening.

name: Cinderguard Scribe
text: Deploy: Choose one: - Glimpse 1. - Gain +1 Power.
flavor: From his quill flows the ink of revolution, as fiery as the red hoods that mark their cause.

name: Daredevil Duo
text: Crystallize and Deploy: Another friendly Unit gains Taunt.
flavor: Where her courage leads, dragon fire follows - a ballet of blade and blaze, unmatched.

name: Dewdrop Sprite
text: Whenever a friendly Elemental Unit is deployed adjacently, gain +2 Power.
flavor: In each glistening drop, a glint of magic, as fleeting and pure as morning's first light.

name: Dragon Egg
text: Ambush: A Player conquered this Lane this Turn.
flavor: Cracks in the egg foretell the birth of a legend, a creature born from flame and scale.

name: Dustdance Efreet
text: Deploy: You may swap this with an adjacent enemy Unit.
flavor: A sinister waltz in the dust, its dance is a trap for the unwary, a lure into the endless, shifting dunes.

name: Roughlands Scourge
text: Deploy: Gain Fear.
flavor: Where its shadow falls, terror takes root, a draconic tyrant of the barren lands.

name: Shifting Sands
text: Ambush: This Turn, a Unit was deployed adjacently. Unearth: Move an adjacent Unit.

name: Torii Spirit
text: Deploy: Unleash <E><E><E>: Gain Fear and Taunt.
flavor: Unleash

name: Windkite Acolyte
text: Deploy: You may swap this with an adjacent friendly Unit and gain +2 Power.
flavor: Soaring on ancient breezes, this acolyte wields the wisdom of the wind.

name: Blood Moon Scarab
text: Whenever a Unit in this Lane is unearthed, gain its Power.

name: Dragonfire Warlock
text: Ally of Dragon: Unleash <E><E>: Bury an adjacent enemy Unit.
flavor: With incantations smoldering on his tongue, he breathes out not words, but the fire of dragons.

name: Dragonwind Harbinger
text: Deploy: Draw the top Dragon of your Deck. Shuffle your Deck.
flavor: In his eerie lament lies the fate of worlds, a grim herald of the dragonfire that will consume all.

name: Gashopper
text: Deploy: For each friendly Elemental Crystal, you may put a Card from your Hand to the bottom of your Deck and draw a Card.
flavor: Enhanced by sulfuric geysirs, each of its eyes sees another future.

name: Glinteye Hoarder
text: Conquer: Draw 2 Cards and bury a friendly Crystal.
flavor: A dragon's passion for gold cast into living form.

name: Raijin's Familiar
text: Deploy: Unleash <E><E><E>: You may move an adjacent Unit to any empty Slot on the Board.
flavor: Unleash

name: Runecursed Wyvern
text: Deploy: Bury a friendly Crystal.
flavor: Empty Crystal

name: Skulloath Lootclaimer
text: Deploy: Bury a Crystal.
flavor: Empty Crystal

name: Spell Cat
text: Whenever a friendly Wizard is deployed adjacently, swap this with that Unit and give that Unit +2 Power.
flavor: Even a sorcerer's cold heart can't escape the affection of a black furball.

name: Vermillion Firebird
text: Bury: you may bury a friendly Crystal to unearth this.
flavor: In its mystical flight, neither blade nor spell can quench its eternal fire.

name: Oasisdweller
text: Deploy: You may return a friendly Spirit or Warrior to your hand. If you do, draw a Card.

name: Cinderguard Irregulars
flavor: In the ember's glow, hooded rebels rise, defying orders with fire in their eyes.

name: Galeweaver
text: Deploy: Swap an adjacent friendly Unit with the top Card of your Deck.
flavor: As guardian of the gales, her touch is both a soothing balm and a tempest's fury, a spirit as unpredictable as the wind.

name: Infernoblight
text: Deploy: Gain Fear. Whenever a friendly Dragon Unit is deployed adjacently, gain +1 Power, and draw a Card
flavor: In the whispers of night, they speak of Infernoblight, a fiery doom awaiting at time's edge, a scorching conclusion to all stories.

name: Raijin
text: Deploy: Copy the 'Unleash' ability of each Unit.
flavor: Where black clouds gather, his presence is near, the air crackling with the energy of his blue lightning.

name: Volcano Embodiment
flavor: Born from molten fury, it stands as both creator and destroyer of lands.

name: Shardhorde Leviathan
flavor: Rising from oceanic depths, its crystalline form is a monolith of untamed power, a behemoth that knows no bounds.

name: Tectonic Shifter
text: Deploy: Each Player may return any of their Crystals to their Hand.
flavor: A single roar, and the world trembles.

name: Sovereign Spellwyrm
text: Deploy: Gain Taunt. Ally Wizard: Glimpse 2. Ally Dragon: Draw a Card.
flavor: At the foot of the Dragonspire, the fabric of magic trembles, reshaped at its will.

name: Crownfire Empress
text: Deploy: You may bury a friendly Dragon Unit to bury an enemy Unit.
flavor: Once, the Drakebane cohorts cut down her children. Now, only soot and ashes remain.

name: Venom-Dew
text: Conquer: You may deploy a friendly Insect Crystal.

name: Slumbering Cavedrake
text: Ambush: This Turn, an enemy Unit was deployed adjacently. Unearth: Gain Fear and +3 Power.
flavor: If a lion sleeps, you kill it. If a dragon sleeps, you run.

name: Dragon Rider
text: Deploy: Copy the Ability of an adjacent Dragon Unit or Human Unit.
flavor: Together, they redefine the possible, her spirit and his fire entwined in flight.

name: Starfall Shaman
text: Ritual: Glimpse 2 and draw 2 Cards.
flavor: Guided by ancient constellations, he beckons knowledge from the heavens, a nod to the legendary magic of old.

name: Cinderguard Flamebearer
flavor: Armed with a blade of searing flame, his every strike ignites the battleground, a beacon of fiery determination.

name: Tidecrasher
text: Deploy: Gain Fear. If there are three or more adjacent empty Slots, gain +5 Power.
flavor: He glides beneath the waves, a leviathan of legend, the subject of sailors' prayers and tales.

name: Eons-old Dragon
text: Deploy: All other Elemental Unit and Nature Units in this Lane gain +3 Power.
flavor: In its slumber, time weaved the wilderness around it, a dragon as ancient as the forest it now embodies.

name: Shardhorde Crystalfang
flavor: Emerging from the heart of the earth, its malachite form gleams, a predator sculpted from nature's deepest treasures.

name: Pyroclastic Zombie
text: Ambush: This Turn, your Opponent conquered this Lane.
flavor: Born from flames and madness, he lumbers through the shadows, an urban legend made flesh and fire.

name: Wasteland Overlord
text: Deploy: Gain Fear. Whenever you deploy a Unit adjacently, that Unit gains Fear.
flavor: A dragon reborn as a demon of wrath, his rampage carves a path of desolation, unstoppable and unguided.

name: Skulloath Marauder
flavor: Bound by dark pacts and whispered curses, he plunders, leaving only desolation in his wake.

name: Alchemist's Incense
text: Ally Wizard: Glimpse 2.
flavor: In his vials swirl the future of medicine and perhaps the key to untold power.

name: Ambrosia Bee
text: Whenever a friendly Mortal Unit is deployed adjacently, gain +2 Power.
flavor: From flower to hive, it crafts a honey so divine, battles are waged over mere droplets of its golden essence.

name: Filthy Peasant
text: Deploy: Gain Taunt.
flavor: In the shadow of grand coliseums and marble halls, he toils, an eternal cog in the city's endless sprawl.

name: Ironstride Courser
text: Deploy: Choose one: - Each other friendly Unit in this Lane gets +1 Power. - Gain +3 Power.
flavor: In the tumult of war, some tasks demand the relentless charge of reinforced steel.

name: Pocket Dragon
text: Deploy: Choose one: - You may move an adjacent friendly Unit. - Draw a Card.
flavor: In the tranquility of his mundane home, this tiny dragon frolics, a creature more akin to playful pet than fearsome beast.

name: Prime Golem
text: Deploy: Move a friendly Construct Unit in this Lane.
flavor: From the world's earliest tales, this colossal guardian emerges, embodying the enduring legacy of its first creators.

name: Siegebreaker
text: Deploy: If you have another Warrior Unit, gain Ward.
flavor: An unstoppable juggernaut under the Empire's banner.

name: Snow Crane
text: Deploy: Draw a Card.
flavor: Its elegant presence blesses the new year with hopes of prosperity and vitality.

name: Stormforged Recruit
text: Ally of Mortal: Gain +3 Power.
flavor: Baptized in rain and thunder, from the chaos of war emerged a true hero.

name: Supply Camel
text: Deploy: A friendly Animal or Warrior in this Lane gains +3 Power.
flavor: Carrying the weight of war, one step at a time.

name: Trusty Companion
text: Ally of Human: Draw a Card and gain Fear.
flavor: At a soldier's side, steadfast and brave, this canine heart knows no fear, only loyalty.

name: Bloodfleet Raider
text: Whenever a friendly Unit is deployed adjacently, gain Taunt.
flavor: With a laugh in the face of danger and a toast to the thrill of the sea, he raids under the Bloodfleet's flag, where freedom is the greatest treasure.

name: Caring Mother
text: Crystallize and Deploy: Another friendly Human Unit gains +2 Power.
flavor: Her gentle lullabies echo promises of greatness, cradled in the heart of the city's forgotten streets.

name: Dojo Drill Instructor
text: Deploy: Draw the top Warrior from your Deck. Shuffle your Deck.
flavor: Its gears and circuits teach more than combat; they instill discipline that outlasts steel.

name: Ironclad Jailwalker
text: Conquer: Your Opponent buries one of their Units in the conquered Lane.
flavor: Neither walls nor bars, but a walking prison, relentless in its pursuit of order.

name: Rampart Shellback
text: Conquer: Double the Power of an adjacent friendly Unit.
flavor: Ankylosaurus

name: Scalehide Trapper
text: Ambush: An enemy Unit with 6 or more Power was deployed adjacently this Turn. Unearth: Bury an adjacent enemy Unit.
flavor: Against the backdrop of roaring giants, his silent patience weaves the web that brings titans to their knees.

name: Trapmaster
text: Deploy: Copy the 'Unearth' ability of a friendly Unit.
flavor: In the game of predator and prey, she crafts her cunning into every snare, her ambition as boundless as the wilds.

name: Augur of the Moonspear
text: Crystallize: A friendly Unit becomes a Warrior Unit until end of turn. Deploy: Gain +1 Power for each adjacent Warrior.

name: Bloodfleet Harpooneer
text: Deploy: Gain Fear. Bury an adjacent Unit.
flavor: A terror of the deep, he and his leviathan companion embody the ruthless spirit of the sea's most notorious pirates.

name: Gold Colibri
text: Deploy: Every friendly Crystal becomes all Realms until the end of your next Turn.
flavor: A mechanical marvel, blending art and whimsy in its flight.

name: Greedy Senator
text: Deploy: Bury each friendly Unit in this Lane to gain its Power.
flavor: For personal gain, he'd unbalance the scales of power.

name: Paragon of Conquest
text: Conquer: If you have Units with a total Power of 40 or more in this Lane, you win the Game.
flavor: Lead

name: Tilling Yoke Beast
text: Whenever you crystallize a Mortal Crystal, another friendly Unit gains +2 Power.
flavor: Ordinary beasts cause only an ordinary harvest.

name: Cinderguard Emberblade
text: Deploy: Choose a friendly Warrior Unit. You may bury an enemy Unit adjacent to the chosen if that Unit has lower Power than the Warrior.

name: Senatorial Phalanx
text: Conquer: Draw the top Human of a Realm that you don't have of your Deck. Then, shuffle your Deck.

name: Ferromancer
text: Deploy and Ally of Construct: You may copy the ability of a friendly Construct.

name: Frontier Centurion
flavor: Beyond the empire's walls, his blade draws the line.

name: Cinderguard Saboteur
flavor: Underneath the red hood lies a will that cannot be extinguished.

name: Harvest Sanctifier
flavor: Her presence heralds the harvest, ensuring the Eternal Plains remain ever fruitful.

name: Volatile Battlemage
text: Deploy: Gain Taunt. Unleash <D><E><N><V>: Gain +4 Power.

name: Ordinary Flower Pot
text: Deploy and Crystallize: You may bury this to draw the top Plant of your Deck.

name: Ancient Scholar
text: Summon: Glimpse 3.

name: Weaponized Pest
text: Deploy: Move all Tokens from a friendly Unit to this.
flavor: Grash√ºpfer mit Rasierklingen

name: Beastcaster
text: Ally of Animal: Gain +2 Power. You may move an adjacent friendly Animal to any free Slot.

name: Trained War Elephant
text: Deploy: Gain +1 Power for each friendly Mortal Crystal.
flavor: A titan among soldiers, its tusks carve a path of destruction, turning enemy lines into mere memories.

name: Starborne Basilisk
text: Deploy: Take an additional Turn.
flavor: Eclipsing suns and moons in its flight, the Starborne Basilisk weaves the future and past into the tapestry of the present.

name: Gladehost Kyudo Master
flavor: Within the silent woods, his arrow flies true, a dance of precision and harmony with nature's rhythm.

name: Chalice Bloodbrewer
text: Deploy: Bury a friendly Mortal Crystal and gain its Power.
flavor: In her ancient veins flows the command of night's children, her will bending the undead to her dark desires.

name: Necromancer
text: Deploy: Deploy a friendly Spirit Crystal or friendly Undead Crystal adjacently.
flavor: In the forgotten corners of the realm, he crafts his rebellion, an army born of death and bound to his dark will.

name: Forsaken Aristocrat
flavor: Once adored in grand halls, now lurking in shadowed corners, thirsting for more than just respect.

name: Alpha of the Stampede
text: Deploy: Move a friendly Dinosaur Unit into an adjacent empty Slot.
flavor: Dinosaurs

name: Amethyst Argosaurus
text: Crystallize: A friendly Dinosaur Crystal gains Crystalborn.
flavor: Veined with amethyst shards, its massive form pulsates with raw, unbridled energy.

name: Astral Unicorn
text: Deploy: Gain +1 Power for each Realm of friendly Crystals.
flavor: Bathed in starlight, it roams the world, a mystical beacon in the vastness of the night sky.

name: Calming Apparition
text: Crystallize: Gain Crystalborn.
flavor: Bathed in an otherworldly glow, it guides lost souls through the cold, a beacon of peace in the hushed wilderness.

name: Caring Matriarch
text: Deploy: You may crystallize the top Card of your Deck.
flavor: Beneath a caring guise, ferocity lurks; woe to those who threaten her brood in the wild depths.

name: Darkwood Tracker
text: Ambush: This Turn, an Enemy Unit was deployed in this Lane. Unearth: Draw the top Hunter of your Deck.
flavor: Where the forest's embrace tightens into a snare, her guidance is a gentle reprieve, her aim true against threats unseen.

name: Emerald Fang Cobra
text: Ambush: An enemy Crystal was crystallized this Turn.
flavor: Its venomous fangs gleam like emeralds in the shadows, a silent harbinger of nature's treacherous beauty.

name: Entwining Creeper
text: Ritual of Plant: Gain +4 Power. Ritual of Insect: Draw a Card.

name: Jeweled Triceratops
text: Deploy: Unleash <N><N><N>: Glimpse 1 and crystallize the top Card of your Deck.
flavor: Imbued with crystalline power, its every charge shimmers with the energy of the shattered cosmos.

name: Leech Dragonfly
text: Deploy: Move all Tokens from an adjacent Unit to a friendly Insect Unit.
flavor: In its swift flight lies a deadly purpose, a tiny terror with the power to fell giants.

name: Nurseplant
text: Ally of Plant: Draw a Card.
flavor: In the heart of the forest's embrace, it stands as a healer and guardian.

name: Nurturing Rootsaurus
text: Deploy: Unleash <N><N><N>: +4 Power.
flavor: Among the ancient ferns, it reigns as a guardian of growth.

name: Nutrient Nexus
text: Deploy: Adjacent friendly Plant Units gain +2 Power.
flavor: Roots deep in ancient soil, it weaves life into every leaf and vine, a pulse of growth in the wilderness.

name: One Eyed Dread
text: Crystallize: Gain Crystalborn. Deploy: Gain Fear.
flavor: The jungle quivers under its cyclopean stare.

name: Raptor Pack
text: Ambush: This Turn, your Opponent crystallized and controls six or more Crystals.
flavor: Their coordinated strikes are as fearsome as they are efficient, a terror to all who tread their domain.

name: Saurian Wraith
text: Deploy: Gain +3 Power if you have a Dinosaur Crystal.
flavor: Echoing from ancient times, its ghostly form strikes terror, a spectral predator from a forgotten age.

name: Shadowpounce Panther
text: Ambush: An enemy Unit was deployed adjacently this Turn. Unearth: You may move this.
flavor: Master of the jungle's dark heart, its every step is a silent threat, a hunter cloaked in near-invisible menace.

name: Shardtooth
text: Ambush: A Unit was deployed this Turn. Unearth: An adjacent friendly Unit gains Ward.

name: Sunflower Sprite
text: Whenever a friendly Nature Unit is deployed adjacently, gain +2 Power.
flavor: As the sun's warmth bathes the world, it spreads its wings of harmony, a sprite that nurtures unity among nature's children.

name: Tiger Matriarch
text: Deploy: Another friendly Nature Unit in this Lane gains +2 Power and Ward.
flavor: Sovereign of stripes and fangs, she embodies the jungle's heart, fierce and nurturing in her dominion.

name: Venus Flytrap
text: Ambush: An enemy Unit was deployed adjacently this Turn. Unearth: Bury an adjacent enemy Unit with 4 or less Power.
flavor: What appears a mere plant masks a deadly trap, capable of snapping shut on much more than flies.

name: Arcane Gorgosaur
text: Deploy and Crystallize: Unleash <N><N><N><N>: Deploy the top Card of your Deck.
flavor: A behemoth of prehistoric mysticism, it commands the elements, sculpting the world as it has for eons.

name: Bloodclaw
text: Deploy: Each Player crystallizes the top Card of their Deck.
flavor: In its monstrous stride, the ground trembles, heralding a primal horror from the depths of damnation.

name: Duke of the Grove
text: Deploy: Deploy a friendly Plant Crystal adjacently.
flavor: In his verdant realm, he summons life with a mere thought, master of the green and growing.

name: Mantis Queen
text: Deploy: Unearth a friendly Unit with Ambush. Draw a Card for each other friendly Hunter Unit.
flavor: The air thrums with the wings of her swarm. The Mantis Queen, a silent empress, orchestrates the chaos into a symphony. I am, against my better judgment, in awe.

name: Sun Crystal Saurus
text: Crystallize: Crystallize a friendly Unit, then deploy a Crystal with lower Costs than that Unit.

name: Living Thicket
flavor: Amidst the emerald canopy, the heart of the forest is beating.

name: Invigorating Lotus Bloom
text: Ally of Dinosaur or Animal: Bury this to give all friendly Dinosaurs and Animals its Power.
flavor: A rare flower that only shows its true beauty within a single night.

name: Photosynthaurus
text: Ally of Dinosaur: A friendly Dinosaur gains Fear. Ally of Plant: A friendly Plant gains Taunt.

name: Southern Reach Bulwark
text: Deploy: Crystallize the top Card of your Deck. Gain +4 Power if it is a Animal or Dinosaur. If it is not, draw 2 Cards.

name: Rootstrosity
text: Deploy: Gain Fear. Gain +3 Power for each adjacent enemy Unit or friendly Plant.

name: Gigantic Terrormaw
flavor: From the depths of the mangroves, devastation awoke.

name: Necroconut Crab
text: Deploy: Gain +1 Power for each buried Unit, then gain an additional +1 Power for each Unit with Ambush.
flavor: Giant Demon Coconut Crab

name: Rotting Alicorn
text: Deploy: You may copy the Ability of another Unit.
flavor: Once pure, now tainted, it mirrors the darkest magics, twisting them with its own corruption.

name: Tainted Jade Initiate
flavor: Embracing the jungle's forbidden elixirs, he communes with spirits unseen, a disciple of mysteries dark and profound.

name: Cryptroach
text: Ambush: Your Opponent conquers this Lane. Unearth: Swap the positions of this and another Unit.
flavor: Its tunnels were once used by ancient kings and pharaohs to guard their eternal rest.

name: Abyssal Silencer
text: Deploy: Bury an adjacent enemy Unit with Power less than the number of friendly Demons.
flavor: An assassin cloaked in the stillness of the abyss, where space bends to his will.

name: Blightcoven Puppeteer
text: Deploy: You may unearth an adjacent friendly Unit.
flavor: Dance for me!

name: Bloodthrone Ambassador
text: Ritual: You may play an additional Unit this Turn.
flavor: Spilling blood is the only language all living things are fluent in.

name: Bloodthrone Sovereign
text: Ritual: Gain +4 Power. Ritual: Gain +4 Power.
flavor: Her throne, a monument to eternal night; her will, an unyielding dominion over darkness.

name: Emissary of Darkness
text: Deploy: Draw the top Demon of your Deck. Shuffle your Deck.
flavor: Wise men resist the temptation of power - foolish men seek it.

name: Forsaken Chronicler
text: Bury: draw a Card.
flavor: His quill dips in secrets as dark as blood, chronicling the silent reign of the Forsaken over the city's heart.

name: Forsaken Soulshiv
text: Deploy: Glimpse twice for each adjacent Void Unit.
flavor: In the dim light, his fingers dance across ivory, each note a whisper of timeless longing.

name: Foul Corruptor
text: Ritual: All friendly Void Units gain +1 Power.
flavor: In her gaze lies the downfall of purity; in her touch, the rot of empires.

name: Ghoulflesh Devourer
text: Whenever an enemy Unit with less Power is deployed adjacently, gain +1 Power.
flavor: Feasting on the meek, it grows ever stronger, a monstrous amalgam of death and dragon might.

name: Grinning Amphora
text: Deploy: Draw two Cards.
flavor: Its grin speaks of boundless greed, yet none truly know its purpose.

name: Intrusive Ambassador
text: Deploy: Draw two Cards, then put two Cards from your Hand to the bottom of the Deck.
flavor: A demon's counsel is a double-edged sword; one edge cuts through lies, the other through the listener.

name: Nethersilk Moth
text: Whenever a friendly Void Unit is deployed adjacently, gain +2 Power.
flavor: Drawn to the void's cold embrace, each nearby shadow fuels its ghostly wings.

name: Nightmare Penguin
text: Deploy: Gain Fear.
flavor: What was whispered as a tale to scare children skulks in the darkness, a terrifying truth behind the fable.

name: Possessed Vermin Brood
text: Ambush: An enemy Unit was deployed adjacently this Turn. Unearth: Gain Taunt.
flavor: A swarm tainted by darkness, their numbers are as endless as their hunger.

name: Shadowsting Scorpion
text: Ambush: An enemy Unit was deployed adjacently this Turn. Unearth: Return an adjacent Unit to its owner's Hand.
flavor: Death's whisper on eight silent legs.

name: Shiverskull
text: Deploy: All friendly Void Units gain Fear.
flavor: His every step is a reminder of mortality's cruel jest; his blade, a sharp retort.

name: Skull Crow
text: Deploy: Your Opponent buries one of their Units.
flavor: With eyes like ghostly lanterns, the guardian of the graveyards watches from above.

name: Symbiotic Crawler
text: Deploy: Another friendly Void Unit in this Lane gains +1 Power and Fear.
flavor: In the shadow of its tendrils, life withers, feeding this sinister, parasitic growth.

name: Nightreaper
text: Deploy: Gain Fear. Bury a friendly Unit and a friendly Crystal.
flavor: Cloaked in midnight, he reaps souls with a blade that slices through fate and time, an eternal arbiter of the inevitable.

name: The Forsaken King
text: Ritual of Angel: Gain +2 Power, Taunt and Ward. Ritual of Demon: Draw 3 Cards.
flavor: In his fall, a kingdom was born, straddling the blurred lines between redemption and ruin.

name: Gorgon Serpentress
text: Deploy: Crystallize an adjacent Unit, its Owner may draw a Card. Gain Fear.

name: Ill-Tempered Imp
flavor: Within its volatile gaze lies a mischief only the brave dare to decipher.

name: Shroom Behemoth
flavor: A colossal fusion of fungus and might, looming large from the forest's hidden depths.

name: Hellblade
flavor: Forged in the deepest fires, sheathed in eternal darkness.

name: Eclipse Dragon
flavor: Mikazuki no Yaiba Type Beat

name: Rotten Stalker
text: Deploy: Gain Taunt.

name: Wringing Wyvern
text: Ritual of Void: Your Opponent bottoms a Card and you draw a Card.

name: Clawing Centipede
text: Ambush: Your Opponent conquers any Lane. Unearth: All friendly adjacent Insect or Void Units gain +2 Power.

name: Voidsinger
text: Deploy: Choose one: - Your opponent shuffles 2 Cards from their Hand into their Deck. - Draw two Cards.
flavor: A serenade from the abyss, its melody fractures reality.

name: Graverobbing Robot
text: Ritual and Bury: Draw the top Undead or Construct of your Deck.

name: Bandage Beetle
text: Crystallize: You may return a friendly Undead Unit or buried Unit to your Hand to deploy this in that Unit's spot.
flavor: Death is an eternal business.

name: Deadfield Tiller
text: Deploy: Unearth up to 2 Units. For each enemy Unit, you draw and for each friendly Unit unearthed this way, your opponent draws a Card.

name: Frightweaver
text: Ritual Animal or Human: Return a friendly buried Unit to your Hand, draw a Card, gain Fear.
flavor: Neither man nor beast can dare to withstand the terror that is exudes this being.

name: Mini Golem
flavor: Carved from the smallest rocks, yet its resolve stands as tall as the mountains.

name: Clocktower Drake
flavor: Ticking gears and whirring cogs give life to this marvel; a testament to mortal genius soaring high in the sky.

name: Roaming Cherub
text: Deploy: Unleash <D><D><D>: Gain +3 Power.

name: Old Bessy
text: Deploy: Unleash <E><D><M><N><V>: Double the Power of all adjacent friendly Units.
flavor: Ancient eyes, a witness to empires' rise and fall.

name: Realmshifter
text: This Card always has all Realms.
flavor: To shift between worlds is to master the dance of existence.

name: Shapeshifter
text: This Card always has all Types.
flavor: One moment a whisper, the next a roar. Who will he be today?

name: Metropoleia
text: Conquer: Draw a Card.

name: Black Colosseum
text: Whenever a Unit is deployed in this Lane, it gains Taunt.

name: Miststrider Hideout
text: Conquer: Bury one of your Units.

name: Coatlanti Underbrush
text: Only Units with 3 or less Power can be deployed in this Lane.

name: Moonspire Outpost
text: Whenever a Unit is deployed in this Lane, it gains Taunt.

name: Thundercrest Peaks
text: Whenever a Unit is deployed in this Lane, it gains Fear.

name: Empire Barracks
text: Whenever a Unit is deployed in this Lane, give it +3 Power. Bury this.

name: Xotchli Sanctuary
text: This Lane can only be conquered by Units with total Power of 10 or less.

name: Treasury of Metropoleia
text: Conquer: Crystallize the top two cards of your Deck.

name: Bataarbad Expanse
text: Conquer: All friendly Units in this Lane gain +1 Power.

name: Sunburst Valley
text: Whenever a Unit is deployed in this Lane, each Player returns one of their Crystals to their Hand. Bury this.

name: Sainkhu Groves
text: Whenever a Unit with 1 Power is deployed in this Lane, it gains +2 Power.

name: Duststorm Valley
text: Whenever a Unit with atleast 5 Power is deployed in this Lane, its Owner draws a Card.

name: Miststrider Assassin
text: Deploy: Bury an adjacent Unit with Taunt.
